title: Announced: NZ Gaming Championship Qualifier

embed.description: Calling ALL NZ Summoners... The New Zealand Gaming Championship is back and bigger than ever! Coming to you this July with Open Qualifiers followed by a 6 Week Live Premiership starting September 3rd. Watch this space for more details...

body:
Calling all the Kiwis!
The New Zealand Gaming Championship has announced it will be running it's qualifiers in July for a 6 Week Live Premiership held in Auckland. 

The tournament will run from 3rd September and further details will be announced in the coming weeks. Make sure you're forming up your 5 man to be in to win!  Check out the last NZGC in this highlights video! 
                 [------>NZGC HIGHLIGHTS 2015<------ ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3qxgOirRYpI)


If you're looking for players to connect with, you can try and post in some of the groups below

[University of Auckland - League of Legends](https://facebook.com/groups/uoalol)
[Otago University Esports Club
](https://www.facebook.com/groups/1389690251332401/)
[Southern Summoners (Canterbury)](https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersOfCanterbury/)
[League of Legends New Zealand (Group)](https://www.facebook.com/groups/lolnz/) 

I'll be sure to post about the details of the official announcement when it's released.

replies.body: Plat 2 supp main based in auckland looking for a team, add me in game
